mapper.sql: wfzb_id, pre_wfls_id, lczsbj, wfnodeszb_dm, czrq, xgrq, user_dm
mapper.insert: insert into wf_ls_zb (wfzb_id, pre_wfls_id, lczsbj, wfnodeszb_dm, czrq, xgrq, user_dm) values (#{wfzbId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{preWflsId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{lczsbj,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{wfnodeszbDm,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{czrq,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{xgrq,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{userDm,jdbcType=INTEGER})

insert into wf_ls_zb
wfzb_id,
pre_wfls_id,
lczsbj,
wfnodeszb_dm,
czrq,
xgrq,
user_dm,
#{wfzbId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{preWflsId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{lczsbj,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{wfnodeszbDm,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{czrq,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{xgrq,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{userDm,jdbcType=INTEGER},
mapper.update:
update wf_ls_zb
pre_wfls_id = #{preWflsId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
lczsbj = #{lczsbj,jdbcType=INTEGER},
wfnodeszb_dm = #{wfnodeszbDm,jdbcType=INTEGER},
czrq = #{czrq,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
xgrq = #{xgrq,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
user_dm = #{userDm,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where wfzb_id = #{wfzbId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update wf_ls_zb set pre_wfls_id = #{preWflsId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, lczsbj = #{lczsbj,jdbcType=INTEGER}, wfnodeszb_dm = #{wfnodeszbDm,jdbcType=INTEGER}, czrq = #{czrq,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, xgrq = #{xgrq,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, user_dm = #{userDm,jdbcType=INTEGER} where wfzb_id = #{wfzbId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select c.xmjbxx_id from wf_ls_chb c inner JOIN wf_ls_zb z where c.wfzb_id = z.wfzb_id and z.wfnodeszb_dm = #{node} and z.lczsbj = #{status}
